com.github.wuic.engine.core
Class ImageAggregatorEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.engine.Engine
      com.github.wuic.engine.NodeEngine
          com.github.wuic.engine.core.AbstractAggregatorEngine
              com.github.wuic.engine.core.ImageAggregatorEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Engine>
@EngineService(injectDefaultToWorkflow=true,
               isCoreEngine=true)
public class ImageAggregatorEngine
extends AbstractAggregatorEngine

This engine is in charge to merge images into one final image.

Since:
0.2.0
Version:
1.8
Author:
Guillaume DROUET
